text: 4 Baruch, also called Paraleipomena of Jeremiah (Paralipomena Jeremiae), contains the Rest of the Words of Baruch and the Epistle of Jeremy. This religious text is said to be a part of the Old Testament by the Ethiopian Orthodox Church. Other Christian denominations do not include in the Bible. ==Related pages== * Book of Baruch * 2 Baruch * 3 Baruch Baruch 4 Category:2nd-century works
title: 4 Baruch
